content:
Sure, here's a short and simple example:

Recruiter: Hi, can you tell me about your experience in customer service?

You: Yes, I have worked in customer service for three years at a retail store. I'm comfortable handling customer complaints and always strive to provide excellent service.

Recruiter: Great, can you give me an example of a time when you went above and beyond for a customer?

You: Sure, one time a customer came in looking for a specific product that we were out of stock on. I offered to check other stores in the area and ended up finding the product at a different location. I drove to the other store and picked up the product for the customer, who was very grateful for my help.

Recruiter: Thanks for sharing that. Is there anything else you want me to know about your customer service experience?

You: Just that I enjoy working with people and am always willing to go the extra mile to ensure customer satisfaction.
